description: Two spire shells laying horizontally just above center with their openings at center; black ground below with feet scratched into pink ink; red splattering throughout.
inscription:
Inscribed in black pencil within composition, LC: >> achte wohl auf die welt <<
Horizontal line in pencil below image
medium: Oil and black ink, printed images on found image
portfolio: From Mein Schwan: Skizzen zu Einem Buch
provenance: William P. Kosmas, London, England (d. 2017); Estate of William P. Kosmas, Minneapolis
signed:
Dated and signed in pencil, LRC: 2001 │ G Multerer
Signed and dated in pencil below image, LC: G Multerer / 2001
title: Untitled (Shells and feet)
